name: You're Stuck with Me
description:
You're Stuck with Me

This is a game jam made game with the theme: Strength in Diversity.

The idea is you as a single player (character) can only do so much, you must venture out and discover other characters that can physically join with you and aid in your battle against the enemies.

A twin stick shooter where your objective is to destroy the enemies, using the correct bullet colour will deal double damage to them. You start off with 10 health points each enemy that is able to hit you will remove a point up until you reach zero and disappear from existence!

You can use either:

Mouse and Keyboard

  • WASD to move around
  • Mouse to aim with left click to shoot

Controller

  • Left Thumbstick to move around. 
  • Right Thumbstick to aim and shoot
  • Right bumper to shoot
